clearcontrol.devices.lasers.devices.hub

Class LasertHubDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.device.name.NameableBase
      • clearcontrol.core.device.NameableWithChangeListener<VirtualDevice>
        • clearcontrol.core.device.VirtualDevice
          • clearcontrol.devices.lasers.devices.hub.LasertHubDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasChangeListenerInterface<VirtualDevice>, NameableInterface, ReadOnlyNameableInterface, OpenCloseDeviceInterface, StartStopDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature

    public class LasertHubDevice
extends VirtualDevice
implements StartStopDeviceInterface, LoggingFeature
    Laser hub device. A laser hub device brings together several lasers.
    Author:
    royer

      • getCurrentPowersInMilliWatt

        public double[] getCurrentPowersInMilliWatt()
        Returns the current laser power for all lasers in this hub.
        Returns:
        an array of doubles containing the current power of all lasers. (the order is the same in which the laser devices were added)
